attributes.action: When Britain goes (fully) digital the BBC can become a subscription channel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I don't see why the public should pay a licence for a channel they do not want, when the technology is here to scramble all bbc tv and radio channels. There is to much money wasted on perks and wages.

A private company would not pay out this sort of money on wages or free perks for employees.
